column4: Due to driver regressions, some intel chipsets were blacklisted. In 10.04 the blacklist is hard coded into the compiz binary. So you'd either have to hex edit the compiz binary and remove your card id from the list, use karmic compiz packages or build compiz from source
How would I go about doing that? I'd do anything to stay in 10.04

I can't really help you much beyond that information because all of the possible workarounds are advanced hacks. And even if you did successfully bypass the checks, there is a chance compiz might fail with the version of the intel driver that ships with lucid
